Container.Name: Typecho
Container.Overview:
Typecho Official Image
Converted By Community Applications Always verify this template (and values) against the support page for the container
https://hub.docker.com/r/joyqi/typecho/

Config.Name: TIMEZONE
Config.Description: default: UTC Server timezone, eg: Asia/Shanghai

Config.Name: TYPECHO_INSTALL
Config.Description: default: 0 Set to 1 if you want to run installation script automatically.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_ADAPTER
Config.Description:
default: Pdo_Mysql
Database driver for typecho, could be: Pdo_Mysql, Pdo_SQLite, Pdo_Pgsql, Mysqli, SQLite, Pgsql.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_HOST
Config.Description:
default: localhost
Database server host, only available for mysql and pgsql drivers.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_PORT
Config.Description: default: 3306(for mysql) or 5432(for pgsql) Database server port, only available for mysql and pgsql drivers.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_USER
Config.Description: Database username, only available for mysql and pgsql drivers.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Database password, only available for mysql and pgsql drivers.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_FILE
Config.Description: Database file storage path, only available for sqlite driver.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_DATABASE
Config.Description: Database name of typecho, only available for mysql and pgsql drivers.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_PREFIX
Config.Description:
default: typecho_
The prefix of all tables.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_ENGINE
Config.Description: Mysql database engine, only available for mysql driver.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_CHARSET
Config.Description:
default: utf8(for pgsql) or utf8mb4(for mysql)
Database charset, only available for mysql and pgsql drivers.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_DB_NEXT
Config.Description:
The action to perform when there are already having some application tables in database.
none: Do nothing, just exit. keep: Keep these tables, and skip the init step. force: Delete these tables, and init data again.

Config.Name: TYPECHO_SITE_URL
Config.Description: Your website url, for example: https://your-domain.com

Config.Name: TYPECHO_USER_MAIL
Config.Description:
default: admin@localhost.local
The email address of admin to create.
